named-query.name: PendingRequests
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where (r.status ='QUEUED' or r.status = 'RETRYING') and r.time < :now ORDER BY r.time DESC

named-query.name: LoadPendingRequests
named-query.query: Select new org.jbpm.executor.entities.RequestInfo(r.id, r.priority, r.time) from RequestInfo as r where (r.status ='QUEUED' or r.status = 'RETRYING') and (r.owner = :owner or r.owner is null) ORDER BY r.time, priority DESC

named-query.name: PendingRequestById
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where (r.status ='QUEUED' or r.status ='RETRYING') and id = :id

named-query.name: EligibleRequestById
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where (r.status ='QUEUED' or r.status ='RETRYING' or r.status ='ERROR') and id = :id

named-query.name: RunningRequests
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where r.status ='RUNNING' ORDER BY r.id

named-query.name: QueuedRequests
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where r.status ='QUEUED' ORDER BY r.id

named-query.name: FutureQueuedRequests
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where r.status ='QUEUED' and r.time > :now ORDER BY r.time ASC

named-query.name: CompletedRequests
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where r.status ='DONE' ORDER BY r.id

named-query.name: InErrorRequests
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where r.status ='ERROR' ORDER BY r.id

named-query.name: CancelledRequests
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where r.status ='CANCELLED' ORDER BY r.id

named-query.name: GetAllRequests
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r ORDER BY r.id

named-query.name: GetAllErrors
named-query.query: Select e from ErrorInfo as e ORDER BY e.id

named-query.name: GetErrorsByRequestId
named-query.query: Select e from ErrorInfo as e where e.requestInfo.id = :id

named-query.name: GetRequestsByStatus
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where r.status in (:statuses) ORDER BY r.id DESC

named-query.name: GetRequestsByBusinessKey
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where r.key = :businessKey ORDER BY r.id

named-query.name: GetRequestsByBusinessKeyAndStatus
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where r.key = :businessKey and r.status in (:statuses) ORDER BY r.id

named-query.name: GetRequestsByCommand
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where r.commandName = :command ORDER BY r.id

named-query.name: GetRequestsByCommandAndStatus
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where r.commandName = :command and r.status in (:statuses) ORDER BY r.id

named-query.name: GetRequestsByDeploymentAndStatus
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where r.deploymentId = :deploymentId and r.status in (:statuses) ORDER BY r.id

named-query.name: GetRequestsByProcessInstanceAndStatus
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where r.processInstanceId = :processInstanceId and r.status in (:statuses) ORDER BY r.id

named-query.name: PendingRequestsForProcessing
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where (r.status ='QUEUED' or r.status = 'RETRYING') and r.time < :now and (r.owner = :owner or r.owner is null) and (r.deploymentId in (:deploymentId) or r.deploymentId is null) order by r.priority desc

named-query.name: PendingRequestByIdForProcessing
named-query.query: Select r from RequestInfo as r where (r.status ='QUEUED' or r.status = 'RETRYING') and r.id = :requestId and (r.deploymentId in (:deploymentId) or r.deploymentId is null)
